name: ps
description: List running system processes. Can filter by user, command pattern, and sort by various metrics.

pattern.description: Filter by command name pattern (grep-style regex)

sort.description: Sort by: cpu (CPU usage), mem (memory usage), pid (process ID), time (running time)

limit.description: Maximum number of processes to return (default: 20)

all.description: Show all processes including kernel threads (default: false)
